column1: in memory of sharon marie goddard -- gary kelley's add'vantage funeral and cremation service| first: last: sharon marie goddard february 23
column4: 72 year old resident of sand springs
column8: 1943 to james s. walker and annabelle (garrison) walker in keystone
column9: oklahoma. sharon worked as a manufacturing assembly line worker. no services planned. condolences may be posted to the guestbook located on this page. photographs and may also be submitted to this online memorial. gary kelley'sadd'vantage funeral and cremation service9761 east 31st street. tulsa
